description.displayText: Liz is fantastic - her reference was great and we had a good experience working with her. We hired her to watch our 16 month old son for 2 days. She is a good communicator, responsive to our requests, and independent within reasonable/agreed-upon limits. Our son had a great time with her and I definitely would trust her to watch him again. I would recommend her to anyone!
